Hello,
I'm currently writing tests for my web-applicaiton using JUnit and I=

came across a method I need to test that takes a DynaActionForm as a
param=
eter.  Problem is, I can't get ahold of the form with the beans
it needs in=
side of the method, from my JUnit test.  Is there a way to
initialize a new=
 ActionForm object from scratch using either an action
path as a string or =
a form-bean name?

-Chuck
